name: Chinatown Community Children's Center
description: Provides quality early education and other social services to meet the needs of new immigrant and bilingual/bicultural families in San Francisco. Their mission is to help integrate these families into American society and gain economic stability while maintaining their cultural identity. Programs serves 84 children, ages 2 to 5 years.
